Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel and Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Wendy Q
Reviews.Content: I was really surprised at how nice this hotel is! The rooms had every amenity: microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, and good television reception. The pool is very nice, and there is a nice water feature/fountain for the kids to play in. It's located at the east end of the strip, right across from Fall Creek Road, so you can skirt the busy strip to get to your location faster. Super nice staff and an amazing price. Recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Shel W
Reviews.Content: We lucked out when we found the Branson Garden Inn! Fabulous price, extremely friendly staff (everyone had a smile and a spring in their step), comfortable beds, gorgeous pool and pool area, great location made it a wonderful stay. We definitely enjoyed the fact that our room faced the pool area! The only remotely negative thing would be that the WIFI only worked in the Lobby area. I would definitely recommend and plan on staying again when we come back to the Branson area!

Reviews.Title: “Watch the room rate and the deposit”
Reviews.Author: Jeanette M
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our recent stay at the Branson Garden Inn, But upon reserving, watch the room rate they quote and the room rate they charge. Also watch for the deposit, which they hold until you check-out. Overall, the hotel was good for the price (the price we ended up paying) Tastefully remodeled, although beds were uncomfortable. Nice pool and pool area. Could of had better attendant service. No daily clean towels or clean room. Also had to ask for soap, shampoo and clean towels several times.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel for the price.”
Reviews.Author: Rocky7474
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for one night during a quick trip to the Ozarks. The price was very reasonable and was the main reason we stayed. The room was clean, the shower worked great, and it even had a microwave and fridge which seemed like quite the bonus for how cheap it was. The only complaint i would have would be the amount of time it took to check in and out. It was only a minor hassle, just noticed that it took quite a bit longer checking in and out then I'm used to. If you're looking for a cheaper hotel in Branson, I don't think you could go wrong with the Branson Garden Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely great inn for a good price!”
Reviews.Author: Beocca
Reviews.Content: The most comfortable bed with lots of big fluffy pillows. Service was great and was happy to assist with. Anything we needed including directions. Rooms had refrigerators, microwaves, iron/ironboards, hair dryer, always hot water for bathes and a great swimming area! All for 50$ a night. I would recommend and always use this inn again!

Reviews.Title: “Low price very nice”
Reviews.Author: hare5759
Reviews.Content: I was so supprised. We need a low priced motel to make our budjet this time and chose Branson Garden Inn 1420 W Hwy 76, MO 65616 . This motel was clean, nice people at the desk and just a very nice place to stay. I can not say any thing bad about the place. I will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “i will never stay at this hotel again”
Reviews.Author: jeff e
Reviews.Content: the first night we arrived was good but it was 2am the 2nd day the maid service did not replace all the towels used nor did they empty the trash the shower pessure sucked then the water kept going from freezing cold to scolding hot . the 3rd day the mais service never came at all so we had to call the front desk and ask if they had maid service we had no clean towels both trash cans were over flowing they got mad at us because we asked for maid service then it took them an hour to bring us 3 towels ans 3 wash rags

Reviews.Title: “Onenight stY”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a cheaprooms.com traveler
Reviews.Content: I had a horrible experience by booking this hotel on cheaphotels.com. Uponarriving I find out that their central officd did nlt forward on information of me booking the hotel Nd they had to do who knows what..but it took half an hour once I got to the counter after one hour of waiting in ljne. The front desk staff handled things the best they could i think being in the position they were in but ok have never had to wait so long to check in and soend so much time. I feel bad for the staff that the company out them in position to be unprepard for so many,people coming to stay there. As I waited in lin at least 4 other guests came up to front desk with complaints about h checkimg in, being put in wrong room, etc. I hold the comoany responaible for my bad esperience and will not stay at thei vhain again in future.

Reviews.Title: “excellent !!”
Reviews.Author: ladytow
Reviews.Content: we stayed 1 night here because we were meeting my grandaughter's plane there in branson..this motel was very reasonably priced and very clean and a great place to stay. the beds and pillows were so comfy i wish i could have packed it in my bag. lol.. the pool is nice and i was thrilled to see a mini frig and microwave in our rooms,since i am diabetic and needed the frig for insulin. we got connecting rooms and enjoyed our stay..we will be using the branson garden inn from now on..the staff was very friendly and helpful and they had laundry facilities even..thank you to them all..

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Surprise!”
Reviews.Author: purdyarteacher
Reviews.Content: At this price, I was surprised at how clean the room was! Carpet looked to be new, bathroom was spotless. Lots of towels. FOUR pillows on each bed was wonderful for propping up and watching TV. There was a coffee maker, microwave and refridgerator in the room. The pool area was landscaped nicely - flower beds beautifully done. Soda machines only one dollar - which is rare anywhere these days. The down side of this place was 75 cent phone calls from the room (use your cell phone). No free continental breakfast - but there was a buffet that was 3.99 which didn't include beverages - those cost extra. Our trip included Silver Dollar City and White Water which was quite a long ways from the hotel so keep that in mind and remember how congested traffic is and plan accordingly. The hotel is very close to Branson Landing though. Over all, I was pleased. I will definately stay here again because it is inexpensive and clean with friendly front desk employees. Thanks Branson Garden Inn for a good experience!

Reviews.Title: “if you love your home you will love to stay here.”
Reviews.Author: blog10
Reviews.Content: we are from belleville ill. this was my first trip to branson mo. my mother told me about branson ,she only said you have to go. we left ill. on our way to branson.this was our first trip on the highway we where unsure about the direction to the inn. will were to check in at 3:00 we were late getting there.so we called the inn no problem the front desk person. talk to us while we were driving. he stayed on the phone with us until we got there. that made our day. we got there the person we were on the phone with meet us and greeted us with this big big smile. he walk us to our room open our door and told us if we need any thing just let him know. we could not believe how polite the staff was to us. the kindness and the big smiles made our stay worth leaving home. our whole trip was blessed. thank you for your kindness to us. we will be back///////// love your friends in belleville ill. we stayed in room 1311. beautiful

Reviews.Title: “Dont be cheap”
Reviews.Author: harv91
Reviews.Content: we stayed at Branson Garden Inn 4 nights that was 4 nights too many. the rooms are filthy, it was only cleaned once during our stay. when we needed towels we had to go to the office and get them, and only got them if they had clean ones. we were locked out of our room for an hour due to lock issues. when I took my issues to management he offered us a discount on our next stay but did not seem to care much about dealing with the issues while they were occuring. we will not be staying at this hotel ever again!!

Reviews.Title: “Branson Garden Inn”
Reviews.Author: kolhead
Reviews.Content: I booked this on July long weekend 2008. The hotel staff is good. The rooms are clean . This hotel is conviniently located on the stip with easy access to the alternate routes which was very usefull to go towards west. The room has refrigerator and Microwave and a TV. In all a nice experience. Only thing I found missing was Internet access...

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: RICK6012
Reviews.Content: i was at the Branson Garden Inn the 5th-8th of June with the 127th ALUMNI MPS from Vietnam. I and my friends were very pleased and impressed with the staff and the accomadions I would recommend it to anyone going to Branson.Our rooms were clean and fresh every day and the breakfast buffet was exellent the staff was outstanding.We got a special deal and our room was $197 from thur.-sun. The staff was also very helpful with planning your day. I would be happy to stay there anytime. RICK RINGLE 1500 N,KORBY ST. KOKOMO,IN.46901

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: Shane3412
Reviews.Content: When we first pulled up to the hotel and drove by the front of the building, my wife was really hesitant to want to stay here, but I asked her to just hold on, and give it a chance, for it had been remodeled recently. By the way, the hotel is just past Dick Clarks when going East on Highway 76, and can be tricky to find on maps or on the internet. We went inside the main office and could tell it was better than we had thought by the outside appearance. The room had a nice leather couch and a great King size bed that we estimate to be a 15" mattress, the bathroom was clean and the towels were nice, which is a great indicator of a hotels frugality. The bed also came with about 8 nice pillows, and I love pillows, so this impressed me. Overall, the experience was great, and I recommend the Branson Garden Inn as a great place to lay your head for less than $50 if you book with Hotelcorp.com. We would stay again, and would recommend to our friends as a cheap nights sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Ok Value, but 2 nights was more than enough”
Reviews.Author: wajones2
Reviews.Content: Just got back from 2 nights at the Branson Garden Inn (old Dogwood Inn). We made the reservation by calling the hotel direct & were given a price of 69.96 a night & told it was totally renovated king room with leather sleeper sofa. When we checked in we were immediately given a "medium/hard" sell to take a tour of their time share and get the rooms from 2/$20 to 2/free, so be prepared! The room was ok, but didn't have the promised leather sofa, although we saw rooms that had this. The room - the bed was comfortable enough with plenty of pillows but very rough sheets - beware if you have sensitive skin! The bathroom was ok here were the problems (1) toilet ran off & on all the time, so we just closed the door to sleep; (2) water not quite hot enough in the shower; and (3) if your tall you will have to deal with very short shower head. Other comments - we found 2 bugs (spider & some kind of termite lookign thing) in the room during our 2 days. Wouldn't stay here again, and plenty of similar looking places much cheaper on the strip.

HotelInfo.Name: Branson Garden Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 1420 W Hwy 76, Branson, MO 65616
